abstract: Monetary Authority of Singapore says it will slow appreciation of Singapore dollar, citing global and domestic economic turbulence; joins series of central banks making moves to help their countries' growth.
lead_paragraph: The Monetary Authority of Singapore aims to slow the appreciation of its currency, as other nations have eased policies amid economic uncertainty.
snippet: The Monetary Authority of Singapore aims to slow the appreciation of its currency, as other nations have eased policies amid economic uncertainty.

headline.main: In Singapore, Central Bank Eases Currency Policy
headline.print_headline: Singapore’s Monetary Authority Eases Currency Policy
